title: TIP1 - LON mining settlement cycle adjustment (LON 挖矿结算周期调整)
body:
Background
* The current LON mining settlement cycle is once a week, and the settlement time is every Saturday at 0:00 UTC. The settlement cycle is long, so it takes a long time for miners to know the exact LON allocation result.

Goal
* Shorten the mining settlement cycle so that miners can obtain LON allocation results faster.

Proposed Action Items
* Change the LON mining settlement cycle from once a week to once a day, and the settlement time to 0:00 UTC every day. It will take effect in the second phase of LON mining.

----------

背景
* 目前 LON 挖矿结算周期为每周一次，结算时间为每周六 0:00 UTC 时间。结算周期较长，挖矿用户需要较长时间才能知道确切的 LON 分配结果。

目的
* 缩短挖矿结算周期，让挖矿用户较快就能获得 LON 分配结果。

提案执行项
* 将 LON 挖矿结算周期由每周一次修改为每天一次，结算时间为每天 0:00 UTC，并在 LON 挖矿第二阶段中实施生效。
